metadata.title: CVE-2021-22004 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in SaltStack Salt before 3003.3. The salt minioninstaller will accept and use a minion config file at C:\salt\conf if thatfile is in place before the installer is run. This allows for a maliciousactor to subvert the proper behaviour of the given minion software.

criterions.comment: salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
